department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) in Canada is soliciting proposals for one (1) Vertical Panel Saw unit to be used in the Shipwright Work Centre at Fleet Maintenance Facility CAPE BRETON (FMF CB). This equipment will be used for Woodworking/Cabinet making in support of the Royal Canadian Navy.
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) in Canada is soliciting proposals for one (1) Vertical Panel Saw unit to be used in the Shipwright Work Centre at Fleet Maintenance Facility CAPE BRETON (FMF CB). This equipment will be used for Woodworking/Cabinet making in support of the Royal Canadian Navy. The following is a list of minimum required specifications for the Vertical Panel Saw: *******************************.
full_summary:
=================
### Government Tender Announcement

**Title**: W3555-249674_B - Vertical Panel Saw

**Reference Number**: WS4032169244-Doc4296921910

**Publication Date**: November 8, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**: December 7, 2023, at 2:00 PM

### Procurement Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals for the provision of one (1) Vertical Panel Saw unit to support the Royal Canadian Navy's Shipwright Work Centre at Fleet Maintenance Facility CAPE BRETON (FMF CB).

**Selection Criteria**: The proposal will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Tender Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), none
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia

### Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End-User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* **End-User Entity Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Anthony Mitch, PSPC/SPAC
* **Contact Email**: [mitch.anthony@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mitch.anthony@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17956401?extsite=MTc5NTY0MDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17956401?extsite=MTc5NTY0MDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

The proposal should include all documentation required to meet the Government of Canada's requirements for a Vertical Panel Saw unit. The tender description must be adhered to. The PSPC encourages interested suppliers to review the tender document carefully before preparing their proposal. The closing date for proposals is
